This cane helps you delicately push your way through crowds.

Adds a 10% bonus to making 'Move Through' attempts on Rooms.

This fan adds an air of mystery to you. It helps make you look thoughtful, when you're really just grasping for a witty reply.

Gives you 50% more time to answer Host Remarks.

This fascinator distracts people when you might have said the wrong thing. Look how shiny it is!

First Negative Remark in any Conversation is Ignored.

This flask helps you take a little extra drink with you when you refill at the Punch Bowl.

Increases Max Booze Capacity by 1.

This snuff box helps keep you awake and alert, even when you've been overserved by the help.

Drinking still gives you Confidence, but doesn't Intoxicate you as much.
